title: Travel Break: static travel photo backgrounds for Home, Hotels, and Store

requirements.summary: Add the 3 uploaded images as optimized, background-ready static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the specified generated filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/` contains the optimized background image files derived from the uploaded images.
Background variants are sized/cropped appropriately for wide screens and remain visually acceptable on mobile (no critical subjects cut off).
Image files are referenced directly from the frontend (no backend routing).

file_operations.description: Add optimized, wide background variant derived from gettyimages-1454662719-612x612.jpg for Home hero background.
Add optimized, wide background variant derived from gettyimages-1250509758-612x612.jpg for Hotels & Stays accent background.
Add optimized, wide background variant derived from gettyimages-1250509765-612x612.jpg for Sales Store accent background.

requirements.summary: Apply the uploaded images as readable background accents: Home hero background with overlay, Hotels & Stays subtle header/hero accent, and Sales Store subtle header/hero accent; keep all user-facing text in English.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero section renders with a background image and an overlay that keeps the headline and buttons clearly readable in both light and dark mode.
Hotels & Stays page includes a visually subtle background/hero accent image that does not reduce form/card readability.
Sales Store page includes a visually subtle background/hero accent image that does not reduce product/cart/checkout readability.
No user-facing text is changed to non-English while implementing these backgrounds.

file_operations.description: Replace the current gradient-only hero with a hero section that uses `frontend/public/assets/generated/travel-bg-hero-couple.dim_1920x1080.jpg` as the background image and applies the reusable overlay pattern to preserve text/button readability in light and dark mode.

Update the top title/intro area to include a subtle header/hero accent background using `frontend/public/assets/generated/travel-bg-resort-view-1.dim_1920x1080.jpg`, keeping the booking cards/forms visually dominant and readable.

Update the top title/intro area (browse step) to include a subtle background accent using `frontend/public/assets/generated/travel-bg-resort-view-2.dim_1920x1080.jpg`, ensuring product grid/cart/checkout steps remain high-contrast and readable.

requirements.summary: Implement a reusable CSS background-image + overlay pattern via global CSS or page components, without modifying immutable UI component sources.
acceptanceCriteria: Background styling is implemented via app/page components and/or global CSS (e.g., `frontend/src/index.css`) without editing any immutable UI component sources.
Background images do not cause layout shift and do not break sticky header readability (header remains legible against the background).
Pages continue to render correctly with Tailwind and existing theme variables in both light and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Add a reusable global CSS pattern for background sections (e.g., a wrapper utility/class for full-width background images with cover/center/no-repeat and an overlay layer that can be tuned per page and respects light/dark theme variables), to be used by HomePage/HotelBookingPage/SalesStorePage without editing `frontend/src/components/ui/*` or other immutable paths.
